resources.string:
You wake up in the middle of a sunny day. There's a nice breeze being transported by the wind.
 You can't remember anything. You just woke up here and nothing else.
 After some minutes your memory starts to come back. You start to distinguish the details about the environment around you.
 Apparently you are located at the center of a mysterious world and your only hope is to get as far as possible.
 After some minutes your memory starts to come back and you try to remember your name:
Please enter a valid alphanumeric name.
Your name is %1$s; game will continue soon!
